item.title: NEED HELP with this Command please
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

try

[code] if (command.equals(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if (p != null) {
client castOn = (client) p;

                castOn.teleportToX = absX; 
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; 
            }
        }
    }[/code]

item.title: NEED HELP with this Command please
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

i wanna add a xteleall command but it dont work when i added it heres the code

else if(command.equals("xteleall") && playerRights >=2) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord } } }

is that right ?? or something wrong with it?
